definition: grass radical 草字頭兒|草字头儿[cao3 zi4 tou2 r5]
for a particular person, occasion, purpose/focused on one thing/special/expert/particular (to sth)/concentrated/specialized

sentences.english: West Lake Water Shield Soup is also called "Chicken, Ham and Water Shield Soup", and it is the traditional Hangzhou famous Food.
sentences.chinese: 西湖蓴菜湯又稱雞火蓴菜湯，是杭州的傳統名菜。

sentences.english: The extraction technology of the polysaccharide from the green marine algae ulva lactuca l. was optimized with the orthogonal design.
sentences.chinese: 用正交設計法對綠藻石蓴多糖成分提取工藝進行研究。

sentences.english: The fifth part evaluates Yang's educational ideology and practice.
sentences.chinese: 第五部門，對楊東蓴教育思惟及實踐的評價。

sentences.english: The thesis is divided into five parts to expound Yang's educational ideology and practice.
sentences.chinese: 本文共分五個部門來闡述楊東蓴的教育思惟與實踐。
